channel.title: Looking For Development Team
channel.description: Hi everyone... I need a development team to help me work on my new RSC project, Kena Island Resort. The official website is at [url=http://www.kenair.tk]www.kenair.tk[/url] Here's Some Screenshots Of What I've Got So Far. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2yots1x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/t8tdmc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1109krp.jpg[/img] I'm making every town an island, so I can connect them with bridges. This is the problem I run into. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/28qfma.jpg[/img] I need someone that will remove the objects and the npc's in the water and the bridge. Or, just tell me how to remove them! LOL Download the client below to work on it. [url=http://uppit.com/v/EZB4K4WT]http://uppit.com/v/EZB4K4WT[/url] Thanks! PS: When The Server Gets Going, You will be Mods! PPS: This is made with Noobscape v3! GO YONG MIN!!! LOL

@bonzakid wrote:

Tip: Give up, your going to waste your effort on something that no one is going to enjoy playing on.

item.title: Looking For Development Team
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Did you copy the edited landscape.rscd file into both the client and the server conf folders? They both must have updated copies or you’ll walk on water or not be able to move, ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For Development Team
item.dc:creator: @josdog josdog
item.description:
@josdog wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:2, topic:336167”]So basically, you want someone to develop a server for you? while you do what exactly?

No offense to you, we all start somewhere, but if you can’t manage to remove game objects and NPCs, then please stop right now.

I will gladly answer any questions you may have, point you in the right direction and even help you fix any errors you may encounter (if I am able to), but I will speak for most people when I say this, we will not do everything if you aren’t willing to give it a shot and help yourself first.

Try looking at your GameObjectLoc.xml and NpcLoc.xml. They are quite self explanatory.

Oh, and the dog image? I don’t dig it. Nor do I dig cows that are able to swim. Good luck.[/quote]
Yong, I have done major work on the map. And I am willing to learn how to move NPCs and objects. I have learned, somewhat. I have done hours of work on the map, and when you walk on the bridge from falador to draynor, the post makes some kind of invisible wall, and there are trees all over the stupid bridge. Also, there is a stupid bug, if you click an NPC in the water, you walk on water, kill it, then you are stuck in the water!!! I don’t want people to make the server for me, I just want to make this server the best it can be before I launch the beta. I will try to remove the objects and NPCs with those XML files, but it will be a lot of work. I know a major overhaul on a server is a lot of work. I am willing to do this. Thanks with the help.

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:4, topic:336167”]

winner for most creative login[/quote]
Thanks!

froggie:

Yeah, I certifiably like that there name.

Thanks, it from my friend’s dog.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For Development Team
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

So basically, you want someone to develop a server for you? while you do what exactly?

No offense to you, we all start somewhere, but if you can’t manage to remove game objects and NPCs, then please stop right now.

I will gladly answer any questions you may have, point you in the right direction and even help you fix any errors you may encounter (if I am able to), but I will speak for most people when I say this, we will not do everything if you aren’t willing to give it a shot and help yourself first.

Try looking at your GameObjectLoc.xml and NpcLoc.xml. They are quite self explanatory.

Oh, and the dog image? I don’t dig it. Nor do I dig cows that are able to swim. Good luck.

item.title: Looking For Development Team

item.description:
@josdog wrote:

Hi everyone… I need a development team to help me work on my new RSC project, Kena Island Resort. The official website is at www.kenair.tk
Here’s Some Screenshots Of What I’ve Got So Far.



I’m making every town an island, so I can connect them with bridges. This is the problem I run into.

I need someone that will remove the objects and the npc’s in the water and the bridge.
Or, just tell me how to remove them! LOL
Download the client below to work on it.
http://uppit.com/v/EZB4K4WT
Thanks! PS: When The Server Gets Going, You will be Mods!
PPS: This is made with Noobscape v3! GO YONG MIN!!! LOL
